text: A Markiesje, also known as Dutch Tulip Hound, is a spaniel type of dog that was first bred in the Netherlands. ==Colour== The Markiesje is usually all black or black with a small amount of white markings. ==Temperament== This dog, like most spaniels, is usually very friendly. They need a lot of exercise and attention to keep them happy. ==References== Category:Spaniels
title: Markiesje
